name: Happy Hour (itch) (Liktoria)
description:
Fantastic, you have just successfully completed your training as an electrician in Kiel. There are problems with the power supply at the local DIY store and you have been called in to fix them. Find out why the power has gone out, look for suitable spare parts to fix it and switch the lights back on. But be careful, something seems to be chasing you in the dark... An atmospheric, creepy walking simulator from the first-person perspective. Tips from Oswald: "Don't leave your children alone in our wood workshop! Their faces have little resistance to our patented RitzRatz multiuse saw blades!" 
Moving: WASD Flashlight: LMB Use: E

Made for GGJ2022
